Since no explicit starting position is provided, I will assume a directional orientation might be necessary from an identifiable starting point. I'll initiate clockwise navigation by first moving right towards the likely accessible space of '0' (eastfacing floor) or any adjacent goal. 

Thus, I will choose to perform the following action: 

``` Action:2 ```
